ðŸ“– Summary: FavBox is a local-first browser extension for enhanced bookmark management. It provides features like tag support, advanced search, duplicate detection, and local notes, all while keeping your data private and synced with your browser profile. It extends the browser's native bookmarking features without replacing them.
